Game.Name: Tatakae! Chou Robot Seimeitai Transformers- Convoy no Nazo
Game.Plot: Tatakae! Chou Robot Seimeitai Transformers: Convoy no Nazo is a Japan-only release that gained some notoriety for being nigh-unplayable. As Ultra Magnus, your goal is to infiltrate various Decepticon strongholds and discover who was responsible for the death of Convoy (a.k.a. Optimus Prime).
